App Name: Nimo TV
Package Name: com.huya.nimo

Brief: Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of gaming with Nimo TV, a leading platform where millions connect to share, watch, and engage in gaming content. Catering to both casual and professional gaming enthusiasts, Nimo TV bridges the gap between players and spectators, providing an interactive hub for gaming culture to thrive globally.
